document_data.mainbody:
Tharaskalagram, also known as Kalag, was a red dragon that lived in the Forest of Wyrms in the Western Heartlands in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The dragon was about  long. He had scarred scales.
Tharaskalagram played a game with the red dragon Rylatarralahtyma.
Kalags lair was in a cave in the side of a small volcano in the Forest of Wyrms. Two rotting green dragon carcasses lay outside of the cave.
